languages.text: "Ты напрасно призвал{mf||а} меня ради праздных забав, элантах. Дети {g|Encyclopedia:AsuryaniGlossary}Азуриана{/g} находят радость в единении — со вселенной. С собратьями. И одним из подобных актов единения является Симфоническое созидание".

"You should not have called upon me for the sake of your own idle amusements, elantach. The Children of {g|Encyclopedia:AsuryaniGlossary}Asuryan{/g} delight in unity — both with the universe and their kin. One of the ways in which we achieve this unity is Symphonic Creation."
languages.original_text: "Ты напрасно призвал{mf||а} меня ради праздных забав, элантах. Дети {g|Encyclopedia:AsuryaniGlossary}Азуриана{/g} находят радость в единении — со вселенной. С собратьями. И одним из подобных актов единения является Симфоническое созидание".

traits.locale_text: "You should not have called upon me at the behest of your own indolence, elantach. The Children of Asuryan find gratification in their unity with the universe. With their kin. One such uniting act is Symphonic Creation."

"You should not have called upon me at the behest of your own indolence, elantach. The Children of Asuryan find gratification in their unity with the universe. With their kin. One such uniting act is Symphonic Creation."

"You should not have called upon me for the sake of your own idle amusements, elantach. The Children of Asuryan delight in unity — both with the universe and their kin. One of the ways in which we achieve this unity is Symphonic Creation."

"You should not have called upon me for the sake of your own idle amusements, elantach. The Children of {g|Encyclopedia:AsuryaniGlossary}Asuryan{/g} delight in unity — both with the universe and their kin. One of the ways in which we achieve this unity is Symphonic Creation."

"You should not have called upon me for the sake of your own idle amusements, elantach. The Children of {g|Encyclopedia:AsuryaniGlossary}Asuryan{/g} delight in unity — both with the universe and their kin. One of the ways in which we achieve this unity is Symphonic Creation."

languages.text: « Je ne suis pas là pour vous divertir, elantach. Mais puisque j'ai répondu à votre appel, autant vous apprendre quelque chose. Les Enfants d'{g|Encyclopedia:AsuryaniGlossary}Asuryan{/g} trouvent le bonheur dans l'unité, aussi bien avec l'univers qu'avec leurs semblables. La création symphonique est l'une des méthodes que nous employons pour nous rapprocher. »
languages.original_text: "You should not have called upon me for the sake of your own idle amusements, elantach. The Children of {g|Encyclopedia:AsuryaniGlossary}Asuryan{/g} delight in unity — both with the universe and their kin. One of the ways in which we achieve this unity is Symphonic Creation."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne suis pas là pour vous divertir, elantach. Mais puisque j'ai répondu à votre appel, autant vous apprendre quelque chose. Les Enfants d'Asuryan trouvent le bonheur dans l'unité, aussi bien avec l'univers qu'avec leurs semblables. La création symphonique est l'une des méthodes que nous employons pour nous rapprocher. »

« Je ne suis pas là pour vous divertir, elantach. Mais puisque j'ai répondu à votre appel, autant vous apprendre quelque chose. Les Enfants d'Asuryan trouvent le bonheur dans l'unité, aussi bien avec l'univers qu'avec leurs semblables. La création symphonique est l'une des méthodes que nous employons pour nous rapprocher. »

languages.text: «No deberías haberme llamado solo en busca de entretenimiento, elantach. Los Hijos de {g|Encyclopedia:AsuryaniGlossary}Asuryan{/g} nos deleitamos en la unidad, tanto con el universo como entre nosotros. Una de las formas de lograr esta unidad es la Creación Sinfónica».
languages.original_text: "You should not have called upon me for the sake of your own idle amusements, elantach. The Children of {g|Encyclopedia:AsuryaniGlossary}Asuryan{/g} delight in unity — both with the universe and their kin. One of the ways in which we achieve this unity is Symphonic Creation."

traits.locale_text: «No deberías haberme llamado solo en busca de entretenimiento, elantach. Los Hijos de Asuryan nos deleitamos en la unidad, tanto con el universo como entre nosotros. Una de las formas de lograr esta unidad es la Creación Sinfónica».

languages.text: “你不该为了解闷就把我叫到这里，外界人。{g|Encyclopedia:AsuryaniGlossary}阿苏焉{/g}的子嗣喜欢融合，无论是与族人团聚，还是与宇宙本身合而为一。我们会通过唤声交响来实现这种和谐的统一。”
languages.original_text: "You should not have called upon me for the sake of your own idle amusements, elantach. The Children of {g|Encyclopedia:AsuryaniGlossary}Asuryan{/g} delight in unity — both with the universe and their kin. One of the ways in which we achieve this unity is Symphonic Creation."

traits.locale_text: “你不该为了解闷就把我叫到这里，外界人。阿苏焉的子嗣喜欢融合，无论是与族人团聚，还是与宇宙本身合而为一。我们会通过唤声交响来实现这种和谐的统一。”

languages.text: 「エランタ、お前は自分の怠惰な楽しみのために私を呼ぶべきではない。{g|Encyclopedia:AsuryaniGlossary}アシュリアン{/g}の御子は、宇宙や親族との一体化を喜びとしている。この一体感を得る方法の一つがシンフォニック・クリエイションだ」
languages.original_text: "You should not have called upon me for the sake of your own idle amusements, elantach. The Children of {g|Encyclopedia:AsuryaniGlossary}Asuryan{/g} delight in unity — both with the universe and their kin. One of the ways in which we achieve this unity is Symphonic Creation."

traits.locale_text: 「エランタ、お前は自分の怠惰な楽しみのために私を呼ぶべきではない。アシュリアンの御子は、宇宙や親族との一体化を喜びとしている。この一体感を得る方法の一つがシンフォニック・クリエイションだ」

languages.text: "Ihr hättet mich nicht zu Eurer eigenen Belustigung herzitieren sollen, Elantach. Die Kinder von {g|Encyclopedia:AsuryaniGlossary}Asuryan{/g} erfreuen sich an Einheit — sowohl mit dem Universum als auch mit ihren Verwandten. Diese Einheit erreichen wir unter anderem durch Symphonische Schöpfung."
languages.original_text: "You should not have called upon me for the sake of your own idle amusements, elantach. The Children of {g|Encyclopedia:AsuryaniGlossary}Asuryan{/g} delight in unity — both with the universe and their kin. One of the ways in which we achieve this unity is Symphonic Creation."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr hättet mich nicht zu Eurer eigenen Belustigung herzitieren sollen, Elantach. Die Kinder von Asuryan erfreuen sich an Einheit — sowohl mit dem Universum als auch mit ihren Verwandten. Diese Einheit erreichen wir unter anderem durch Symphonische Schöpfung."

languages.text: "Beni günlük eğlencelerin için çağırmamalıydın elantach. {g|Encyclopedia:AsuryaniGlossary}Asuryan{/g}'ın Çocukları'nı mutlu eden şey birlikteliktir. Evrenle de olsa soydaşlarıyla da olsa. Bu birlikteliğe ulaşmanın yollarından biri de Senfonik Yaratım'dır."
languages.original_text: "You should not have called upon me for the sake of your own idle amusements, elantach. The Children of {g|Encyclopedia:AsuryaniGlossary}Asuryan{/g} delight in unity — both with the universe and their kin. One of the ways in which we achieve this unity is Symphonic Creation."
